name: The conveNYANce store
description:
The conveNYANce store is a chill, no-pressure game about Nyanners running a small shop!
Stock shelves and serve clients at your own pace.
Here you go big guy https://youtube.com/clip/Ugyso9U_KjZ01XTTW1Z4AaABCQ

How to play

At the start of each day, you must remove out-of-date products and restock the shelves. Click on the door on the right to do so (it might take several minutes, that's just how the rhythm of the game is).

After you're done preparing the shop, it will automatically open. Clients can come in, and they will pick the items they desire and bring them to the counter.

Depending on what the bubble above the client says, they require different things, but you only need to click on the client.

If you are away or don't click after one minute, the client will leave without buying anything. You must then put the items they left on the counter back on the shelves by clicking on the items.
